title: Cyrillic will no longer cause the MDT importer/exporter to sometimes crash, various other minor bugfixes and additions

changes.change: Profile pictures are now displayed in the route overview pages.
The amount of views per route are no longer calculated on the fly but are cached instead. This should greatly improve performance on the /routes and /affixes pages. Again.
Added an option to hide the floor breakdowns in your pulls sidebar. Default is visible.
Fixed an issue with paths/drawn lines sometimes not being properly coupled to eachother, rendering them unusable.

Enemy visual attributes (in the 4 corners of the enemy on the map) now properly hide/show based on the zoom level they should be visible at, when you switch to a floor that was previously visited before.
MDT string importing/exporting has been replaced with another library.

With the above, certain unicode characters no longer generate errors upon import/export (such as some cyrillic characters). Your export strings will now no longer be stripped of non-ascii characters should an issue occur. Thanks to Rodriguez for reporting & going back and forth about this.
